attributes.action: Sign this petition to uphold democracy and the vote to Leave the EU.
attributes.additional_details: There is a petition running to revoke article 50 and remain in the EU. Show Parliament that we want democracy to be upheld and respect the decision on the original vote to leave the EU
attributes.background: Politicians and people who would like to remain in the EU are repeatedly trying derail the Brexit process and making claims that people did not know what they were voting for when they decided to vote to leave the UK. Show them your support to uphold the vote to Leave
